alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 6:38PM MDT until June 27 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAAKON...NORTH CENTRAL JACKSON AND EAST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 638 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Wall, or 26 miles west of Philip, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grindstone and Philip. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 109 and 113. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
